name: Razorespine Dungeons
description:
In the World of Legendary Adventure in the southern Wild Lands lies the Razor Spine Mountains. A mountain range that extends deep into the chaotic South, it is a favorite place of adventures for the many and strange treasures that can be found within.

The Rune Academy is a small school of magic situated near one of the many cave systems of the Razor Spine. You are a student hear, and like all students, you must venture into the caves and dungeons to find Materium deposits to pay for your tuition. How deep into the mountainous dungeon will you delve?
